meanings.definition: The female reproductive organ that produces eggs.
meanings.sent1: The ovaries release eggs for reproduction.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her ovaries during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The ovaries were like little egg factories in her body.
meanings.sent4: Her ovaries were the treasure troves of potential life.
meanings.sent5: The ovaries were crucial for her ability to have babies.

meanings.definition: The pair of organs in the female reproductive system that produce hormones.
meanings.sent1: Hormones are regulated by the ovaries in women.
meanings.sent2: The ovaries play a key role in the endocrine system.
meanings.sent3: Her ovaries were like the hormonal control center of her body.
meanings.sent4: The ovaries were the conductors of the hormonal orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The ovaries were the silent influencers of her mood and health.
